text: Moxley is an unincorporated community in Jefferson County, in the U.S. state of Georgia. ==History== A post office called Moxley was established in 1881, and remained in operation until 1914. The community was named after B. J. Moxley, the proprietor of a local gristmill and country store. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Jefferson County, Georgia
title: Moxley, Georgia
